name: rock-incense
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Rock moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Rock-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Sudowoodo begets a Bonsly Egg.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
